story_galar_02_07000/2401_1001_0100_10: Chairman Rose and Team Rocket’s boss?!
story_galar_02_07000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Yes. Team Rocket has been using their usual
method to achieve their goals.
story_galar_02_07000/2401_1001_0300_10:
They agitate others, then commit crimes behind
their backs.
story_galar_02_07000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Are you saying they’re just using Chairman Rose to
get what they want?!
story_galar_02_07000/2401_1001_0600_10:
There’s no way Giovanni has any interest in
“the future a millennium from now” that Mr. Rose
has been lamenting.
story_galar_02_07000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Then we need to hurry and tell Chairman Rose
about this!
story_galar_02_07000/2401_1001_0800_10:
If he finds out he’s been working with Team
Rocket, then maybe...
story_galar_02_07000/2401_1001_0900_10: No. I don’t think that’ll work.
story_galar_02_07000/2401_1001_1100_10:
“If it’s for the sake of a prosperous future, I don’t
care who I work with.”
story_galar_02_07000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Now that Chairman Rose has made up his mind,
it’s unlikely he’d stop even if we told him who he’s
working with.
story_galar_02_07000/2401_1001_1600_10:
he forcibly carried out his plan even knowing the
dangers of Eternatus.
story_galar_02_07000/2401_1001_1800_10:
That’s why we must fundamentally change
Chairman Rose’s way of thinking in our
upcoming battle.
story_galar_02_07000/2401_1001_1900_10:
So let’s face him head on with our strength and
our feelings!
